Title: Relates to rights of persons with disabilities to be accompanied by a guide dog or service dog
Summary: Protects the rights of persons with disabilities to be accompanied by a guide dog or service dog in a place of public accommodation or housing accommodation; imposes a misdemeanor penalty for violations; requires the division of human rights to conduct a public awareness and education campaign.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to rights of persons with disabilities to be accompanied by a guide dog or service dog
